title: ScSpecFunctionV0
description:
ScSpecFunctionV0 is an XDR Struct defined as:

```text struct SCSpecFunctionV0 { string doc<SC_SPEC_DOC_LIMIT>; SCSymbol name; SCSpecFunctionInputV0 inputs<>; SCSpecTypeDef outputs<1>; }; ```
